articles.title: Graffiti painted on Copenhagen's Little Mermaid statue
articles.description: COPENHAGEN, Denmark (AP) — Copenhagen's famed Little Mermaid statue was found doused with pro-Hong Kong graffiti early Monday.
articles.content:
COPENHAGEN, Denmark (AP) Copenhagen's famed Little Mermaid statue was found doused with pro-Hong Kong graffiti early Monday.
Three lines in red, reading Free Hong-Kong were painted on the rock on which the bronze sits, next to the same text in white.
Police… [+682 chars]

articles.author: By DOUG FERGUSON AP Golf Writer
articles.title: Cameron Smith wins Sony Open in another Hawaii comeback
articles.description: HONOLULU (AP) — Two weeks in Hawaii brought rain, unusually strong wind, playoffs and two players who thought victory was out of reach until the winner's lei was draped around their necks.
articles.content:
HONOLULU (AP) Two weeks in Hawaii brought rain, unusually strong wind, playoffs and two players who thought victory was out of reach until the winner's lei was draped around their necks.
Cameron Smith was the latest Sunday at the Sony Open.
He might have be… [+4263 chars]
